name: The Backrooms: Survival Game
description:
Welcome to The Backrooms game, it’s a survival horror game where you have to run and explore the empty backrooms and escape from the monster chasing you.

How to play? Use the joystick controllers to move and look around the backrooms. Use your escaping skills to run and solve your survival adventure. Play this backrooms game now and enjoy it!

You have to find your way out, but some monsters don't want you to leave, so use the wall map to find your way, and check the rooms to find and collect coins that will allow you to escape from the backrooms.

Are you ready to try this backrooms adventure? Can you face your fears and win this challenge and escape from the backrooms? Download the game and let us know.
